column3: - #7438 is a version of #7082 (which indeed still has to be merged)\n- #7387 has no counterpart for master, good catch\n

ACK #7387 for master

@gmaxwell do you think it makes sense to merge #7438 into master or will that just complicate getting #7082 merged?
Gmaxwell told me on IRC that it wasn't a problem: also ACK #7438 for master.\n
